    Woodcraft of Chattanooga: August Classes : 08-24-2024

    When: 2024-08-24 (Friday)
    Time: Varies
    Venue: Woodcraft of Chattanooga
    Address: 5824 Brainerd Road, Chattanooga, TN 37411
    Entrance Fee: Varies
    Event Website
    ###

    The sheer number of classes and events Woodcraft puts on is impressive! If you’re just starting out in woodwork, want to learn a new technique, or just want to socialize with like-minded people, I think you’ll find what you’re looking for below. Check the event website for more information on each class.


    Classes:

    August 1st: Journey Thru Joinery: Haunched Tenons


    August 1st: Journey Thru Joinery: Pocket Holes


    August 1st & 8th: Woodworking Fundamentals I


    August 1st: Intro to Turning


    August 2nd & 3rd: Woodworking Fundamentals II


    August 2nd: DATE NIGHT: Turned Scoops


    August 3rd: Intro to Turning


    August 3rd: Pen Turning 101: The Basics


    August 4th: Spindle Turning 101: The Basics


    August 6th: Pen Turning 101: The Basics


    August 8th: Journey Thru Joinery: Sliding Dovetails


    August 8th: Journey Thru Joinery: Reinforced Butt Joints


    August 8th: Journey Thru Joinery: Castle Joint


    August 9th & 10th: Woodworking Fundamentals III


    August 10th & 11th: Bowl Turning 102: From Log to Bowl


    August 12th–14th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 201: Tall Linen Cabinet


    August 12th: Intro to Wood Burning


    August 13th: Pen Turning 102: Using Acrylics


    August 15th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 202: Dovetailed Drawers II


    August 15th–17th: Spindle Turning 104: Advanced Spindle Projects


    August 16th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 203: Raised Panel Doors


    August 17th: Kitchen Cabinetmaking 204: Spraying Finishes


    August 17th: Sharpening Turning Tools


    August 20th & 27th: Pen Turning 103: Pouring and Turning Resin Pen Blanks


    August 22nd: Intro to Turning


    August 23rd, 30th & 31st: Fine Furniture 101: Casework Construction


    August 23rd: DATE NIGHT: Pair of Turned Pens


    August 24th: Bowl Turning 103: Natural Edge Bowls


    August 25th: Artistic Turning 201: Three Corner Bowl


    August 29th: Sawdust Social: Campfire Roasting Fork



    If you like woodcraft and don’t see anything on this list that interests you, I don’t really know what to say. If you do partake, I hope it’s a great time!
